title: Set alias for columns in dataset but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is listed below the expression builder.
EB: According to SCR 78193 in the tracker, the first column in the expression builder should display the alias name instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select the dataset from the available options. 
3. Double-click on the first column name. 

Expected result: The alias name for the column should appear as row['column1'] after double-clicking on the original name.
